attributes.action: Take pitbulls off the dangerous dog list and make them legal.
attributes.additional_details: My previous experience with dogs has taught me that no dog is the same regardless or breed. I have never had a pittbul bite me however I have had an akita bit me aswell as Yorkshire terrias, both of which are not on the band breed list.
attributes.background: Every dog has the potential to be classed as dangerous. It is wrong to destroy a pittbul just for being a pittbul, even when it hasn't done anything wrong.
